content.text: Match ends, West Bromwich Albion 2, Bristol City 2.
Second Half ends, West Bromwich Albion 2, Bristol City 2.
Goal!  West Bromwich Albion 2, Bristol City 2. James Morrison (West Bromwich Albion) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jonny Evans.
Stéphane Sessegnon (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Kieran Agard (Bristol City).
Corner,  West Bromwich Albion. Conceded by Joe Bryan.
Foul by Marlon Pack (Bristol City).
Saido Berahino (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Goal!  West Bromwich Albion 1, Bristol City 2. Kieran Agard (Bristol City) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box to the centre of the goal.
Substitution, Bristol City. Kieran Agard replaces Jonathan Kodjia.
Substitution, Bristol City. Wes Burns replaces Aaron Wilbraham.
Delay in match James Morrison (West Bromwich Albion) because of an injury.
Chris Brunt (West Bromwich Albion) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Jonathan Kodjia (Bristol City) is shown the yellow card for excessive celebration.

Goal!  West Bromwich Albion 1, Bristol City 1. Jonathan Kodjia (Bristol City) header from very close range to the top right corner. Assisted by Luke Freeman with a cross following a set piece situation.
